Description:
This hotel is centrally located in the commercial area at the heart of Doha on Al Asmakh Street near Souq Najada and the Arab Bank Roundabout. Furthermore, it is just 2 minutes by car from the hotel to the Doha corniche with its remarkable location at the centre in the Al Sadd area. Doha International Airport is just 15 km away.

This is a prestigious hotel which adds spirit to the capital of Qatar. The hotel is distinguished by its classical atmosphere, evident in its interior design, marble flooring, sound proof ceilings and pastel colours. It also has an ultra modern atmosphere and upholds world class service standards. Facilities at the hotel include a reception hall, a café, a bar, a restaurant, conference facilities plus room and laundry service. The hotel comprises of 56 tastefully decorated rooms, consisting of 24 single rooms, 24 twin double rooms, 6 junior suites & one fully equipped luxurious penthouse located on the eighth floor.

All the en suite rooms are decorated in harmonious colours and are fitted with an individually regulated air conditioning unit, multi-channel cable TV, a refrigerator, a minibar, a direct dial telephone with voicemail, and Internet access. There is a luxurious en suite bathroom and a daily laundry service.

Breakfast, light delicacies and hot beverages are served around the clock either at the hotel's cosy coffee shop or by the well equipped room service team. The restaurant offers a diverse menu featuring oriental and continental dishes with a selection of appetisers served in a genuine and hospitable style.

Drive straight from the airport towards the Sudan roundabout and follow round to the right. The hotel is located on the right hand side after the first signal.

Description:
This hotel is one of the many ancient fortresses and archaeological sites that dot the landscape of Qatar. The hotel is located in the centre of Al Sadd, close to the Royal Plaza shopping centre.

This hotel is set to exceed what is expected from a small hotel. Renovated in 2003, it includes 126 well-equipped rooms, and in all 8 suites, guests can expect a personalised standard service, which they are used to, and even more, elegant designs, luxury room furniture and high standard facilities. The air-conditioned city hotel offers guests a safe, lift access, a currency exchange counter and a nightclub. The restaurants hold up to 100 visitors and offer more than what meets the eye, such as oriental and western dishes. In Coffee Beanery or in Cloud Nine Bar, guests are able to quench their thirst. The business centre offers a complete typing service, telefax and Internet access with a WLAN access point. Business guests may make use of the conference room. Guests may also make use of the service and laundry services. A car park may be used by guests arriving by car.

All rooms include a hairdryer, satellite/ cable TV, ironing equipment, wireless Internet access in all areas in the hotel, centrally regulated air conditioning, safety deposit box, minibar/fridge, daily newspaper, bottle of water, coffee and a tea tray.

It is possible for guests to train in the gym (exclusive for hotel guest).

Guests arriving by car from the airport should take the C ring to Al Sadd children's hospital and then take a left at the crossroads. This hotel is located just on the other side of the street.
